title: Textile, "Face Maps: Halfseen", 2005
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: two intercrossed plain weave structures (double cloth), controlled by digital jacquard head
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Small portrait showing a woman's eye and nose, resembling an out-of-focus black and white photograph. Study for Binary Traces: Kay (2007-33-1).

exhibitions.title: Design Life Now: National Design Triennial 2006
